data.title: Grand Canyon National Park (U.S. National Park Service)
data.text:
South Rim Shuttle Bus Service

During Spring 2024, free South Rim shuttle bus service is in operation.

You can leave you vehicle at, or near your lodge and ride the bus around the village, and out to scenic overlooks and trailheads.

When you arrive on the South Rim, you will receive a copy of the South Rim Pocket Map and Services Guide. The map below shows the lodges and their relation to winter season shuttle bus routes. You may download a copy of the map here

South Rim Lodging Just Outside of the Park

South of Grand Canyon Village, accommodations are available in the gateway community of Tusayan, 7 miles (11 km) south of Grand Canyon Village, along Arizona Highway 64.

For general information about lodging in Tusayan:

Tusayan (Purple) Route Shuttle Service

If you plan to be staying at one of the lodges in Tusayan during the 2023 Summer Season, (Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day weekend, 2023), free shuttle bus service will run between Tusayan Hotels/Lodges and the South Rim Visitor Center, every 20 minutes.

Visitors entering the park from the gateway community of Tusayan via the free shuttle bus must present a valid park entrance pass. Entrance passes may be purchased at park entrance stations, online, or at these businesses in Tusayan.
